short_summary: 2 consultant resource from the Task and Solutions Professional Services Stream 1 Human Resources Services Stream
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for 2 consultant resource from the Task and Solutions Professional Services Stream 1 Human Resources Services Stream at the Junior level. The Junior Compensation consultants must conduct quality assurance reviews, support the QA program with verification of payroll transactions as required, support the quarterly and biweekly reporting and provide recommendations, as required.
full_summary:
# [ **Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Stream 1 Compensation Consultant](#section-1)

## [Title](#title)
English: Task and solutions professional services (TSPS), Stream 1 Compensation Consultant
French: Services professionnels centrés sur les tâches et les solutions (TSPS), volet 1 Expert-conseil en rémunération

## [Reference Information](#reference-information)
* Reference Number: PW-22-01007010
* Solicitation Number: 2022-ADMHRCIV-0032
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: 2022-09-13
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-24T14:00:00 (Expired)

## [Procurement Information](#procurement-information)
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)

## [Contracting Entity](#contracting-entity)
* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

## [Requirements Summary](#requirements-summary)
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 2 Junior level consultants from the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Stream 1 Human Resources Services Stream. The consultants must:

* Conduct quality assurance reviews
* Support the QA program with verification of payroll transactions
* Provide recommendations, as required

## [Contact Information](#contact-information)
* Name: Emely Ospino
* Email: emely.ospino@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-901-6341
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

Note: As the information shared by the contractor is already quite large, I will omit the trade agreements and GSN information for simplicity. If it is required, please let me know and I will include it.

It is worth noting that this entry serves as an announcement for an expired tender. Therefore, submissions are not being accepted at this time.  If you would like me to draft a fresh tender announcement for a new contract opportunity, please let me know and I will create it for you.  *enter information as needed* .
